kickstart.description: NAS Appliance Node. You should create your own extend-nas.xml file to add functionality to this appliance type.
kickstart.changelog:
$Log: nas.xml,v $ Revision 1.1 2007/12/10 21:28:33 bruno the base roll now contains several elements from the HPC roll, thus making the HPC roll optional.
this also includes changes to help build and configure VMs for V.
Revision 1.8 2005/02/16 00:40:04 mjk graph cleanup
